subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sacramento forward Ron Artest was booed when he was introduced and almost every time he touched the ball last night at The Palace of Auburn Hills, where the Kings lost to the Detroit Pistons, 91-74.
snippet: Sacramento forward Ron Artest was booed when he was introduced and almost every time he touched the ball last night at The Palace of Auburn Hills, where the Kings lost to the Detroit Pistons, 91-74.
